Posts.Content: I just had my three months post visit on Valentine's Day. PSA less then 0.01, but no DRE. Should I complaine? Lol
Posts.Signature: 59 yo very healthy and active trail runner feb 16' psa 5.6, repeat 3.6 and 4.6 august biopsy 0f 12 6 positive five 3+4 one 3+3 one with perineural infiltr. MRI two spots of inflitr capsule Davinici at Lahey clinic, Burlington, MA ,Dr Moinzadeh on Nov 3/ 2016 , about 25% of nerves taken on the left side, some lymph nodes taken, awaiting pathology. Pathology pT3a perineural invasion present, but margins free, lymph nodes free, seminal vesicles free. Catheter out on 11/17/16

Posts.Title: Trimix gel

Posts.Content: I hope it will smooth. Never had surgery before but I heal very well never needed more then Advil for pain. Few days after prostate biopsy took 12 miles trail race without any problems. Thank you Chuck
Posts.Title: Newbie signing in

Posts.Content: Chuck, thank you very much for good word. Still feels like it is not me that the other guy. I think that awakening will be in the recovery room, and will start from there.

Posts.Title: Newbie signing in

Posts.Content: I've been reading this forum for a few weeks. Great place, great info. Time to sign in. Just had MRI two days ago , unfortunately some invasion of the capsule on the left side so may preclude nerve sparing and that side. November 3rd is the day. Getting little nervous. Collecting all the necessary thing I red about on the forum. Trying to think positive. My plan to be back on the trail with snow shoes before Christmas.

Posts.Title: Newbie signing in

Posts.Content: Thank you guy, what a great forum, it is so good talk to people who really understand what I'm going through. MK good luck to you to we'll be fine there is no other option is itüòÄüëç I have brother your age, he lives in Canada, doesn't even have a doctor yet. Planing to call him today that I just doubled his risk and he needs to start taking care of himself. I have whole list of necessities which I made reading this forum. Some I bought already some coming tomorrow and I'm going shopping today. I should be all set. One thought my doctor keeps catheter for two weeks. I have full confidence in him just curious if anybody did that? Thank a lot again.
